hero.tagline: Reka Thepa ya Lebenkele la Hao
hero.subtitle: Ho reka habonolo le kapele. Ha ho foromo tse rarahaneng. Fumana thepa ya hao e isiwa lebenkeleng la hao.
hero.communitySupported: Ikopanye le mabenkele a fetang 500 tikologeng ya hao

support.defaultMessage: Dumela! Ke hloka thuso ka taelo ya ka ya TOSS.

groupBuying.title: Ho Reka ka Sehlopha - Ditheko tse Ntle
groupBuying.description: Ikopanye le beng ba mabenkele a mang tikologeng ya hao ho reka thepa mmoho le ho fumana ditheko tsa wholesale. Letsatsi le le leng la thomello ho bohle!
groupBuying.benefit1: Boloka ho fihla ho 20% ditaelong tse ngata
groupBuying.joinNow: Ikopanye le Sehlopha sa ho Reka
groupBuying.memberCount: Beng ba mabenkele ba 53 tikologeng ya hao

ordered.title: Taelo e Amohetsw–µ
ordered.description: Re fumane taelo ya hao mme re e lokisa

preparing.title: Re Lokisa Thepa ya Hao
preparing.description: Re paka taelo ya hao ka hloko

outForDelivery.title: E Tseleng
outForDelivery.description: Motsamaisi o tlisa thepa ya hao lebenkeleng la hao

delivered.title: E Isitswe
delivered.description: Thepa ya hao e fihlile lebenkeleng la hao

offline.title: O sa inthaneteng
offline.message: Lintho tse ling di ka se sebetse ntle le inthanete. Re tla boloka mosebetsi wa hao mme re tla kopanya ha o kgutla inthaneteng.
